dang / @160a * // rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam / brgya byin gyis smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so // rab 'byor gyis smras pa / koo shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro // koo shi ka de ji snyam du sems / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam / brgya byin gyis smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so // rab 'byor gyis smras pa / koo shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro // koo shi ka de ji snyam du sems / khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar nus sam / brgya byin gyis smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so // rab 'byor gyis smras pa / koo shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gang sems pa de ni bsams pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro pa'i sbyor ba yin no // brgya byin gyis smras pa / btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur chos thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin / rab 'byor gyis smras pa / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' @160b sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed / de bzhin du sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa de'i tshe / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i bar du yongs su shes par 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bdun du snang pa'i shes pa'i sbyor ba yin te / 'di dag gis ni sbyor ba gsungs so // koo shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / gzugs rlom sems su mi byed / gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed / gzugs bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do // sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed // sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed / rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed / rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed ; rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed / sprul ba'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed / de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs @161a * // kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed / sprul ba'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su mi byed / sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do // zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid yin no // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te / phyogs gcig tu 'khod do // de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus / sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di @161b nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongs su zhu bar byed cing chos ston par mdzad pa sems kyis mthong bar gyur to // de bzhin du shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs rnams dang / mtshams rnams thams cad na sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / rab 'byor zhes bya ba'i dge slong kho nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhu ba byas shing ston par byed pa dang / thams cad du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhu bar byed cing chos ston par mdzad pa rnams sems kyis mthong bar gyur to // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro // gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'byung ba de dag kyang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug po dbang du gyur par shes par byed pa yin rgyas te / no // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad rgyas te / no // ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams @162a * // pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs rtag ces bya ba'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am / bdag ces bya ba'am / bdag med ces bya ba'am / sdug ces bya ba'am / mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // gzugs bcings zhes bya ba'am grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am / mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // de bzhin du bde zhes bya ba'am / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am / bdag ces bya ba'am / bdag med ces bya ba'am / sdug ces bya ba'am mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba'am / grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // gzugs 'das zhes bya ba'am / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'am / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa zhes bya ba'am / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba'am / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro // de bzhin du so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams @162b cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro // tshor ba dang ; 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes bya bar chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa yin no // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched @163a * // dang ; rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang ; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / de bzhin du phung po dang ; khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / @163b kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o // de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa yin no // rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi nam mkha' ltar skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab @164a * // kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no // rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / nam mkha' la gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gos ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa yin no // rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no // gang rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ; nam mkha' la brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tha snyad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa yin no // gang rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /

column1: apravyAhAra pAramitA iyam Bagavan yat uta prajQApAramitA
column2: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang @164b brjod du med pa'o // rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du brjod du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no // gang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do // rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa yin no // rab 'byor chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na / bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro // lus rgas pa dang / 'khogs par mi 'gyur ro // rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo de @165a * // ni mi bde ba spangs nas dus byed par 'gyur ro // chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha'i bu stong phrag mang po yang de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro // gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro // rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te / bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //

column1: BagavAn Aha
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de de bzhin no // de de bzhin te / rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dam / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa de'i bsod nams tshad med pa / grangs med pa / gzhal du med pa / bsam gyis mi khyab pa / mtshungs pa med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro // rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na ; 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che chen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa yin no // rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ston par gyur na dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro // byol song gi skye gnas las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro // gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro // dbul po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro // rgyal rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro // bram ze'i rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro // khyim bdag gi rigs s'a la chen por skye bar 'gyur ro // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do // 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar byed do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed do // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong @165b ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar sbyin par byed do // de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir te / de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs s'a la chen bo rnams yod do // bram ze'i rigs s'a la chen po rnams yod do // khyim bdag gi rigs s'a la chen po rnams yod do // rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams yod do // tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do // 'od chung gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams yod do // 'od gsal gyi lha rnams yod do // dge chung gi lha rnams yod do // tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do // dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do // sprin med kyi lha rnams yod do // bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams yod do // 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do // gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams yod do // mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do // mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do // rab lta'i lha rnams yod do // legs mthong gi lha rnams yod do // 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do // nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do // rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do // cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do // 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do // dgra bcom pa nyid yod do // dgra bcom pa nyid yod do // rang byang chub yod do // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod na / bsam gtan bzhi rnams yod do // tshad med pa bzhi rnams yod do // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams yod do // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu @166a * // phyin pa yod do // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod do // nang stong pa nyid yod do // phyi stong pa nyid yod do // phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams yod do // rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams yod do // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams yod do // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams yod do // mngon par shes pa drug rnams yod do // ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do // gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do // byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams yod do // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams yod do // mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams yod do // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams yod do // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yod do // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do // dkon mchog gsum rnams yod do // sangs rgyas dkon mchog yod do // chos dkon mchog yod do // dge 'dun dkon mchog yod do // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de dag thams cad rgya cher bstan to // de bas na 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa yin no // rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni chos gang yang skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba'am / yongs su gzung ba'am / dor ba med do // de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am / @166b kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / rnam par byang ba'am / yongs su gzung ba'am / dor bar bya ba'i chos rnams med do // rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni skye ba'am / 'gag pa'am / dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am / zag pa dang bcas pa'am / zag pa med pa'am / kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'am / kha na ma tho ba med pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa'am / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'am / 'jig rten pa'am / 'jig rten las 'das pa'am / 'dus byas pa'am / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang med de / rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o zhes bya ba ni lam la chos shes pa yin no // rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni chos gang gis kyang gos pa med do // de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag dmigs su med pa'i phyir te / rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na / pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa'o zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa yin no // rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / de ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed / de ltar mi dmigs te / de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba'o // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro la / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lam la rjes su shes pa yin te / 'di dag gis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan pa yin no // rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang mthong bar byed pa ma yin / mi mthong bar byed pa ma yin / @167a * // ston par byed pa ma yin / mi ston par byed pa ma yin / ster bar byed pa ma yin / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / skye bar byed pa ma yin / 'gag par byed pa ma yin / 'chad bar byed pa ma yin / rtag par byed pa ma yin / don gcig par byed pa ma yin / don sna tshogs pa ma yin / 'ong bar byed pa ma yin / 'gro bar byed pa ma yin / kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa ma yin / rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin / 'grib bar byed pa ma yin / 'phel bar byed pa ma yin / 'das par ma yin / ma 'ongs par ma yin / da ltar byung bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste dang po'o // rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams las shin tu 'da' bar byed pa'am / gnas par byed pa ma yin / gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am / gnas par byed pa ma yin / gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa'am / gnas par byed pa ma yin / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / phyi stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / phyi nang stong pa nyid ster bar byed pa ma yin / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ster ba'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / mngon par shes pa rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa @167b ma yin / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin ; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni lam shes pa'i dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste / gnyis pa'o / // / bam po bzhi bcu pa / rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed ba ma yin / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ster ba'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog par byed pa ma yin / 'dus byas kyi khams ster bar byed pa'am / 'phrog bar byed pa ma yin no // de ci'i phyir zhe na / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid de dag ni de bzhin du gnas pa nyid kyi phyir te / de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so // mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do // mngon par @168a * // rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to // 'grel to //

column1: vitarka vicAra anupalabDAm upAdAya
column2: rnam par 'byed do // gsal bar mdzad do // yang dag par ston to // de nas lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po steng gi bar snang la 'khod de ga zha phyung nas kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog autpala dang / ku mu da dang / punda r'i ka dang / man d'a ra ba rnams 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur to // kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te / 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba yang ma yin / gcig tu bskor ba yang ma yin te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'khor ba'am mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no // de ci'i phyir zha na / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am / mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams lam rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // tshad med pa dang / bsam @168b gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyi stong ba nyid kyis stong kyis stong ngo // ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang ; dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //

column1: suBUtiH Aha
column2: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo'o // chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya yang chos gang yong mngon par rdzogs par @169a * // 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis / chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la chos gang yang bskor ba'am mi bskor ba yang ma mchis te / de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis yongs su mi mthong ba yang ma mchis so // de ci'i slad du zhe na / de ni 'di ltar gang bskor bar bgyi ba'am / mi bskor bar bgyi ba'i chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i phyir ro // de ci'i slad du zhe na / de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste / stong pa nyid bskor bar bgyi ba'am mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags / mtshan ma ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba'am / mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so // smon pa ma mchis pa bskor bar bgyi ba'am / mi bskor bar bgyi ba ma lags so // de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / brjod pa dang / btags pa dang / rab tu bkod pa dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / rnam par dgrol ba dang / mtshon pa dang / yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan / sus kyang ma bzung / gang sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so // gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yangs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te / chos bstan pa 'di la ni gang sus kyang sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa ma mchis so zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa ste gsum pa'o // 'di dag gis ni thams cad shes pa nyid gsungs so // 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rjes su 'brangs nas dag par gtugs pa las thams cad shes pas dbang du byas ba spyod pa'i khyad par gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o / /// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

column2: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la rnal 'byor du bya ba de lta bu'i khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba yin no //

column2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @294b pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgoms pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bzod par gtogs pa'i gnas skabs te phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags bcu dgu pa yin no //
